Your contributors

These people must give their information:

  • All owners claiming disadvantage and their spouses
  • Everyone who owns at least 10% of your firm
  • All officers, directors, board members, managers, and partners

Manage your contributors

There are things to do before you can proceed.

1 sections need to be completed.

  • Add contributor(s)

Once you have completed the tasks above, you will have the ability to submit your application to the SBA.
